name: Joann ROSIPAL, an individual, Appellant, v. MONTGOMERY WARD, a corporation

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: Joann ROSIPAL, an individual, Appellant, v. MONTGOMERY WARD, a corporation.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN and STOUT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Anthony J. Martin, P.C., Monroeville, for appellant. Joseph Lurie, Philadelphia, amicus curiae-A.F.L.-C.I.O.
Scott A. Millhouse, Louis C. Long, Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek & Eck, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
538 A.2d 495
Joann ROSIPAL, an individual, Appellant, v. MONTGOMERY WARD, a corporation.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 10, 1988.
Decided March 21, 1988.
Anthony J. Martin, P.C., Monroeville, for appellant. Joseph Lurie, Philadelphia, amicus curiae-A.F.L.-C.I.O.
Scott A. Millhouse, Louis C. Long, Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek & Eck, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
